security_audit.summary: This is a minimal prompt-based skill with no code execution capabilities. Contains only YAML frontmatter and a simple test prompt. The pre-computed static findings were evaluated and determined to be false positives - the reported patterns (URLs, C2 keywords, weak crypto) do not exist in the actual files. The skill consists of 2 files with 177 lines total: SKILL.md (8 lines) with YAML frontmatter and skill-report.json (169 lines) with metadata. No scripts, network calls, file access, environment variables, or external commands detected.

content.value_statement: A minimal skill template for testing skill format and structure. Use this as a starting point to create new skills with proper YAML frontmatter configuration.
actual_capabilities: Demonstrates skill file format and structure
Provides template for new skill creation

output: This is a test skill for demonstrating skill format
It contains minimal YAML frontmatter with name, description, and model
Use this as a template when creating new skills

output_examples.input: Create a new skill based on tester
output: Copy the SKILL.md file as your starting point
Modify the frontmatter fields to customize your skill

best_practices: Always include required frontmatter fields (name, description, model)
Use clear, descriptive names that indicate the skill purpose
Test skills in a safe environment before deployment
anti_patterns: Creating skills with no clear purpose or functionality
Using overly complex prompts without clear structure

faq.question: What is this skill for?
faq.answer: This is a minimal template skill for testing and demonstrating proper skill format and structure.

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code as defined in the supported_tools field.

faq.question: Can I customize this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, modify the frontmatter fields and add custom prompts to create a skill with your desired functionality.

faq.question: Is this skill safe to use?
faq.answer: This skill has no code execution, network access, or file system capabilities. It only responds to prompts.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: This template skill has no custom functionality. It requires extension to perform useful tasks.

faq.question: How do I create a real skill?
faq.answer: Start with this template and add your custom prompts, configuration, and any required capabilities.
